reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Protection or temptation
reviews.reviewText: I thoroughly enjoyed reading this book by Ava MacAdams. It has it All: a simmering sensual attraction between main characters, mystery and intrigue, twists and turns, a glimpse of the delicate balance needed to survive life among the ton…and a scandal. Lady Ann Hatson is a debutant with a problem. She has a secret admirer. Not just your average poetic secret admirer, but an obsessive, threatening, dangerous stalker. She doesn’t want her parents to know, but her brother and protector is away on tour. A frightened Anne turns to her brother’s friend Alexander, the Duke of Windsor, for help. The Duke is seen by the ton as heartless, dangerous, and domineering. A man who wouldn’t think twice to ruining a girl’s reputation. If he is all these things, why would Anne’s brother ask him to watch over her while he’s away? The two agree to set up a fake courtship in order to keep Anne safe, but Alexanders’s help comes at a cost. Is Anne just trading a dangerous stalker with a man who could be dangerous to her reputation? The attraction between these 2 characters is strong and steamy. Will the courtship remain fake or become real? Who is tormenting Anne with the horrible letters? Will Ann loose her standing in the eyes of the ton? I hope you enjoy finding out as much as I did. I received an ARC copy of the book, but that did not influence my review in any way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Her brother's best friend
reviews.reviewText: Anne wants excitement in her life. She takes risks that could ruin her. She also has a stalker and needs the help of her brother's best friend to protect her. The more time they spend together, the more Anne wants excitement only with her protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Wicked , Pleasurable, Protective, and Forever. !
reviews.reviewText: A Duke and his Best Friends Sister have feelings for one another never sharing them even to each other. Now together in A Fake Courtship, Trying To Find A Stalker , Scandal A Buzz , Feelings Hidden , Emotions Sizzling , Whatever Could Go Wrong ? The Stalker Look Out For A Surprise !Anne Hatson was the daughter to the Marquess of Angleton . Her Brother Christians best friend was Alexande Duke of Winsor . They had all hung out and spent Holidays together since childhood. She was now in her Second season on the Marriage Mart. Only her Heart wasn’t in it.Alexander Dunst the Duke of Winsor had a bad reputation amongst the Ton. He was asked by Christian to watch over sister while he was away on Tour. He knew of her Stalker and needed to protect her.Anne and Alexander get to together when she is frightened and asks for his help. Only he says he won’t do it for free ! What would the cost be ? Fake or Real ? It didn’t matter ! Could there feelings win over with the Stalker and Scandal ? Would she get Her Fairytale Love Story ? Wait and See !Ava MacAdams gives us this Dynamic ! Exciting! Enchanting ! Super Couple ! Ever After Love Story !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A story a sister being protected by her brother's best friend. This is a well used plot with Alexander and Anne. There are a number of twists and turns to this story that keeps the reader interested. Generally, I enjoy this trope however in this book there is a lot of dominance and subservience that I really don't care for. I generally enjoy this authors work, but was a bit disappointed in this story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Open Your Hearts To Love
reviews.reviewText: Alexander was asked by his best friend Christian to watch after his sister Anne since he was going away for a number of months. Alexander was reluctant to do this as he had feelings for her ever since he was young and did not know how he would be able to keep those feelings in the background if he had to be constantly in her presence. This was going to be especially hard on him if he was going to have her dance and flirt with other men at the parties and balls he was going to have to chaperone her at. Anne was not happy that her brother had tasked his best friend as her protector especially since she has had a crush on him since she was young and he was always around teasing her. However, when she received troubling stalker letters she turned to him for help. Alexander did have a troubled past that was holding him back from fully committing to Anne but as things unfolded he learned that losing her was not an option. Finding out who the stalker was and putting to rest scandalous gossip our two heroines finally open their hearts to each other and to the love that they have for each other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An amazing story
reviews.reviewText: This is a story of a young woman that is being protected but her brother’s best friend. There are things going on as there are twists but will it all work out? I voluntarily reviewed an Advance Reader Copy of this book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Her Wicked Duke
reviews.reviewText: I totally enjoyed reading this book. the relationship between Alexander and Ann was entertaining and I found Ann's mother was a very likable character. I will recommend this book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sometimes what we see as children influence how we think as adults.
reviews.reviewText: Alexander was her brother's best friend and he agreed to watch over her and help her find her stalker. Along the way they admit they loved each other for years. They had fears to overcome after seeing their own parent's marriages and what it could do to a person before they could understand how to achieve the kind they wanted.

I enjoyed the book. It has an intriguing plot with likable characters, lots of steam and sensuality and unexpected twists and turns.For some time now, Anne has been receiving disturbing letters from a anonymous admirer that terrify her. Until now, she has been protected by her brother, but when he sets off on a tour of the continent, he asks his best friend Alexander to look after his sister.Alexander, a social recluse with a bad reputation, has long been attracted to Anne and takes on the task, even if Anne is not particularly enthusiastic at first. She has also long had a soft spot for him, but feels provoked by his commandeering behaviour. The passion between them flares up and they begin a push-and-pull game of seduction, jealousy and dominance, while the stalker becomes increasingly dangerous…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A good story with an unexpected twist. Duke Alexander's best friend asked him to act as chaperone for his sister, whilst he was away in France for three months. Lady Anne had been receiving letters from a stalker, at times they were loving but usually contained a threat as well.Alexander agreed, reluctantly, because he has been secretly in love with Anne since they were children.Anne and Alexander agreed to attend balls together and gradually they move on to agree a fake courtship. However, the stalker always seems to know what is happening. Their relationship becomes quite intimate and there are rumours which ruin Anne's reputation. When the stalker is revealed it is a very unexpected twist. Will the stalker finally be silenced? Will Anne and Alexander be able to find happiness feeling safe. Read on and enjoy this well-written, steamy story

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Anne and Alexander have both been have had feelings for one another for a long time but will not act in them due tongue friendship with her brother. When her brother asked him to look after her and they spend time together they soon give in to their desires.

Had Alexander been honest about his feelings for Anne, this book could never have been written. So we watch him fight the conflict between his sense of honor and his desire for the woman he is determined to protect from a stalker. Love taking a detour to HEA.
